body_html:
@gunan,
I believe issue there is different. Reporter there is trying to use gcc avx intrinsics in .cu files. passing -Xcompiler "-mavx" should be perfectly fine. Besides, the wrapper actually would pass -mavx (or any -mxxx) flag to compiler but would not pass -march=sandybridge which would also enable same flags.

body:
@gunan,
I believe issue there is different. Reporter there is trying to use gcc avx intrinsics in .cu files. passing -Xcompiler "-mavx" should be perfectly fine. Besides, the wrapper actually would pass -mavx (or any -mxxx) flag to compiler but would not pass -march=sandybridge which would also enable same flags.
